headline: Citigroup hires Drago Rajkovic as co-head of M&A from JPMorgan, memo says
summary: NEW YORK (Reuters) -Citigroup hired Drago Rajkovic as its co-head of mergers and acquisitions from rival JPMorgan Chase, according to a memo seen by Reuters on Friday.  Rajkovic, who has more than three decades of advisory experience, was most recently global chairman of M&A at JPMorgan, according to the memo signed by Citi's head of banking Viswas "Vis" Raghavan, who is also a JPMorgan alum.
